model.domain

Class Request

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.domain.Request
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Request
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The Request class implements Serializable.The Request class represents a request on a book which is sent by a user to the owner of the book in order to be borrowed. There are instance variables type book student which represents both the lender and the borrower.The request has a status as being accepted, denied or waiting. The request also has a date on which the request is sent for a book.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Request(Student borrower, Book book)
      The constructor is initializing the instance variables it takes two parameters as borrower and a book.the status of the request is always sets to waiting for the time the request is sent.

      Request(Student borrower, Book book, java.lang.String status, java.time.LocalDate date)
      The constructor that takes borrower, book, status and date as parameters.
